tagline: IDL code for analyzing in-line holographic microscopy images with the Lorenz-Mie theory of light scattering
body:
### Welcome to the Lorenz-Mie Project
This page describes how to track and characterize colloidal particles by
analyzing their holograms with the predictions of Lorenz-Mie theory.
name: Lorenzmie
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
